content.rendered:
bioforce

Thematic humanitarian experts

The Learning and Development coordinators are our thematic humanitarian experts. Their expertise is applied to all our teaching and learning actions, and they are active in the networks and clusters in their area of expertise.

Audrey Rochette

Project Management  
Audrey holds a Master’s degree in Management of the health and social sector (University of Limoges) and a Master’s degree in Crisis Analysis and Humanitarian Action from the University of Savoie. For two years, she was the general delegate in India for a child sponsorship association. She then joined the head office of the child protection association ECPAT France (End Child Prostitution and Trafficking) for 11 years as head of the Africa programmes, in charge of the technical, administrative and financial management of projects. At Bioforce since 2021, she ensures the quality of our learning actions in Project Management.

LinkedIn profile
Our team

To ensure the smooth running of Bioforce, men and women take action every day in France, in Senegal, in CAR, in Lebanon and in Jordan. Discover more about them.
